database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: MODa: Fast multi-blind modification search through tandem mass spectrometry
entry.description: These datasets, Human Plasma (LTQ), HEK293 (LTQ), and Lens (LCQ Classic), were used in this work, 'Fast multi-blind modification search through tandem mass spectrometry' (MCP 2012).
